text: As I sit here in the Lost Sector waiting for my alien brothers and sisters to join.. I realize that we all truly have one thing in common - we are not only the Runners of Mega City, we are also the Smokers of Mega City.. for way too long I have been selfishly hiding the seeds from the past, using my underground hydroponics system to grow some of the best marijuana in existence.  I shall take these seeds and share them with my alien friends, bots, skelly, and humans of Mega City. Today, I announce the creation of 7229 Dispensary and Smoke Shop. We shall smoke on the finest of ganja -dubbed Chain OG - a hybrid of immense THC percentage.. Find me in the Lost Sector and enjoy fine company and the best gas of Mega City.  I also am willing to divulge the secret of rolling a perfect blunt/joint.
